item.title: Supreme Court upholds federal regulations on ghost gun kits
item.description: The Supreme Court on Wednesday upheld government regulation of self-assemble firearm kits that produce untraceable weapons known as "ghost guns."

item.title: WATCH: Astros prospect celebrates his major league call-up with parents
item.description: Houston Astros manager Joe Espada brought the parents of top prospect Cam Smith into the club house to join in the celebrations.

item.title: Yemen war plans group chat: A timeline of the mishap
